item.title: White Refugees Deported to Venezuela After Failing to Assimilate
item.description: WASHINGTON, D.C. â€” In what immigration experts are calling “the ultimate plot twist,” the United States has begun deporting white refugees back to Venezuela after they failed to properly assimilate into American society. The controversial policy, which went into effect last week, has already seen hundreds of former suburbanites and office workers relocated to Caracas after they were deemed “culturally incompatible” with American values. “We gave them every opportunity to fit in,” said Department of Homeland Security spokesperson Janice Williams.
